posts.post_title: Lot of (7 remaining) T213-1 Coupon Cigarettes
posts.post_content:
All cards are raw but were once in holders.  Original flip will be included with each card.
Prices assume payment via ppff or personal check.  
Pics of remaining cards are also here: [url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/139478047@N03/albums/72157668902643359/[/url]
Thanks,
Rob
:)
